kNN - k Nearest Neighbors

kNN is a very simple but powerful machine learning algorithm.

In this video

  • distance formulas
    • Manhattan distance
    • Euclidean distance
    • Minkowski distance
  • normalizing values and the minmax method.
  • kNN algorithm
